title: Baked Teriyaki Chicken
directions: In a small saucepan over low heat, combine the cornstarch, water, sugar, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, ginger, and ground black pepper. Let simmer, stirring frequently, until sauce thickens and bubbles.
Place chicken pieces in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish. Brush chicken with the sauce. Turn pieces over, and brush again.
Bake for 1 hour, marinading every 10 minutes, and flipping half way through.
